quotes.author: Socrates
quotes.content: The unexamined life is not worth living

quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.content: God is dead! He remains dead! And we have killed him.

quotes.author: Voltaire
quotes.content: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent Him

quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
quotes.content: Philosophy is a battle against the bewitchment of our intelligence by means of language

quotes.author: G. W. F. Hegel
quotes.content: Only one man ever understood me, and he didnâ€™t understand me

quotes.author: Hazrat Ali
quotes.content: There will come a time where nothing will be hidden except truth, and nothing will be revealed except falsehood

quotes.author: Plato
quotes.content: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation

quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
quotes.content: Man is born free, but is everywhere in chains

quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre
quotes.content: Everything that exists is born for no reason, carries on living through weakness, and dies by accident

quotes.author: Molana Jalal Uddin Rumi
quotes.content: You are not just a drop in the ocean, you are the entire ocean in a drop
